title: Low Budget allocation to healthcare: Finance Secretary says it is primarily states' responsibility - Moneycontrol
content: Low Budget allocation to healthcare: Finance Secretary says it is primarily states' responsibility  Moneycontrol
description: Finance Secretary T V Somanathan said the Centre provides for some "cross-cutting health infrastructure" and also spends on the Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana, which helps people from lower strata of the society to access healthcare.
